normalized: asagi assessed that she was going to make no progress as things stood.
she was about to take a great distance from it, in order to gain time to focus her spiritual energy, so that she could settle things with her ninja arts.
then.

name: asagi
normalized: it sped up?!
as if it had read asagi's movements, the majuu's charge speed became incredible.
a velocity greater than that of asagi, who boasted of her speed.
its charge was just like a flash of lightning, unable to be perceived, even by asagi's eyes.
asagi was finally able to see the majuu, which she had lost sight of, but that enormous horn was already right in front of her eyes.

name: asagi
normalized: gaah!
she somehow managed to twist her body right on the brink, and avoid getting skewered.
however, the force of its charge had struck asagi's body directly.
sent flying by the beast's head-butt, asagi spun as she flew through the air and was thrown onto the floor.
nevertheless, her momentum didn't stop, and she slid across the rooftop.
and so, she was flung headfirst into the raised edge of the rooftop.

name: asagi
normalized: gah…?!
she had at least avoided falling, but the damage she had taken was great.
although asagi tried to get up immediately, her knees stayed on the floor, and she became unable to move.
the majuu howled like it was confident of its victory.
baring its ferocious fangs and slobbering.
lowering its head and lifting its rear, it took an attacking posture for the sake of killing asagi and eating her.

name: asagi
normalized: guh, uu…
asagi shook her head, due to her vision becoming blurry.
her mind was hazy, but she cracked the whip on her wavering legs, and somehow stood up.
as things stood, if she were charged at, she would definitely be defeated in the next attack.
if she didn't gain time to recover her strength, she would be chomped to death by those dirty-looking fangs.
however, the majuu ruthlessly kicked out its developed hind legs.
at precisely lightning speed.
the beast brandished its enormous horn.
and drew near asagi.

name: asagi
normalized: kuu…!
asagi couldn't move.
she feebly readied her sword, which she grasped tightly, but.
she had no expectation that she could stop it.
the majuu closed in.
to skewer her──
take this, air-splitting kick!
just kidding♪
right before the horn pierced through asagi.
a young woman's voice was heard from inside the majuu's shadow, and that instant, something jumped out from there.
using its momentum, that something kicked the majuu high into the sky.
nice pass!
filthy animal.
being rude to my asagi-sama… take this!
a woman's voice was also heard from the sky.
the young woman who had given off that voice swung a gigantic axe, and brought it down onto the demon, which was flying through the air, with all her strength.
the majuu took a heavy blow, and crashed to the floor.

name: sakura
normalized: onee-chan, are you all right?!

name: murasaki
normalized: asagi-sama!
the young woman who had jumped out from the shadow and the young woman who had come down from the sky ran up to asagi.
